metadata.title: CVE-2016-9878 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Pivotal Spring Framework before 3.2.18, 4.2.x before 4.2.9, and 4.3.x before 4.3.5. Paths provided to the ResourceServlet were not properly sanitized and as a result exposed to directory traversal attacks. It was discovered that Spring Framework incorrectly handled path inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to read arbitrary files.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.5-1').
